node.title: Abraham and the Heathen: Does God Actually Listen to the Prayers of Hindus, Buddhists and Muslims?
node.description: Tackle the big ideas of God, sex, relationships, the gospel and how to do life well! Grasp inspirational and relevant lessons from the incredible story of Abraham. These practical presentations will combine the most up-to-date Biblical and apologetic research o many hot topics in the world and church today.
